website_summaries.verdict: A somewhat pricey yet high-quality solid cleanser that gets the job done with minimal effort.
pros: This is a jumbo-sized, charcoal-infused bar that not only cleans brushes of makeup but rids them of dirt, oil, and bacteria
Has a hint of lavender to leave brushes smelling fresh
The large size enables you to clean multiple products at once
cons: Some users reported this bar leaving a slight, dark residue and prefer the lighter version

customer_reviews.title: and i've got to say this product is pretty impressive. I was worried this product wouldn't stack ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used almost all other name brand brush cleaners, including MAC, BareMinerals, NYX, and Tarte, and i've got to say this product is pretty impressive. I was worried this product wouldn't stack up but boy was I wrong. It's a great replacement. You only need a small dab of product to work up a generous lather, so theres no need to use a lot. I will more than likely be purchasing this again when I need to restock.
customer_reviews.author: Deenanor

customer_reviews.title: Great product, a little trouble with the tube packaging.
customer_reviews.text: This soap appears to clean my Jane Iredale and MAC brushes well. They feel very soft after I wash them. The only thing that I don't really like is the way the soap is packaged. When you are holding and wetting the brushes and then you open the soap cap the soap runs right out of the tube because it is so thin. Then trying to get the tube closed back up while not loosing a bunch of product has been a little tricky. Maybe a tube that stands up with the opening at the top or change to a pump bottle might be better.
customer_reviews.author: SCScounselor

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Saved me from having to buy new sets of makeup brushes. Makes them feel like new and this bottle lasts forever! Only complaint is that it takes a bit more scrubbing than I’d prefer to inflict upon my beloved Bobby Brown brushes to get all the soapiness out, because they do get crunchy if product is not 100% washed out.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth The Price
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give this a try because my brushes and sponges didn't feel fully clean. This product works! It cleaned thoroughly and I love that it has tea tree oil to get rid of bacteria. My stuff looked like it hadn't been used before! TIP works best with a makeup cleaning matt.
customer_reviews.author: Lali

customer_reviews.title: Makeup brush necessity
customer_reviews.text: I just used this product for the first time. Cleaning my makeup brushes has always been important to me. The other types of cleaners I've used in the past do not compare to this cleaner. Either have been to soapy so that it takes forever to rinse out, or to greasy feeling, due to the ingredient they added to keep brushes supple. This one is neither. I was amazed at how clean my brushes looked and felt afterwards. Using it along with a cleaning mat, my brushes felt new again. This is what I will use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: JackiTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It works well with cleaning brushes and sponges that were used for powder or liquid makeup. I didn't find that it worked well with creme makeup products. Be careful using the product because alot will come out of the tube.
customer_reviews.author: nyc44

customer_reviews.title: Great product and very potent!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful but very potent! A little bit goes a long way so don’t use very much. I like using this with an actual brush cleaning tool, seems to help. I also don’t care for the smell, but it is ok. It works really well and gets all your makeup off. If you don’t mind smells, then I feel like this is a great product for you and it will last forever!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This stuff did a great job of cleaning my brushes
customer_reviews.text: This stuff did a great job of cleaning my brushes. It has a pleasant smell and my brushes feel much better...plus I know I'm not spreading bacteria all over my face! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Emerald3358

customer_reviews.title: If you’re okay with using too much product, this is for you
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t quite understand everyone else’s review complaining about the product coming out of the tube until I bought it. Ot does it’s job as far as cleaning is concerned but it does seem to leak out of the tube uncontrollably which will inevitably cause you to have to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Shanyelle Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Works well rinses easily
customer_reviews.text: Like that this product rinses so easily! And seems to work. Scent is just ok, nothing special nothing obnoxious either. Why is a rating request for “softness”? Weird... i gave that one just three stars...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is legit.
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner is amazing. I had forgotten how soft my foundation brush was! This got makeup from deep down in the bristles that other cleaners missed. Plus its 1/3 of the cost of most brush cleaners in the stores. Can't rave enough about it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Torres

customer_reviews.title: I look forward to washing my brushes now ;D
customer_reviews.text: My brush cleaner arrived just in time!! I got to washing all my brushes the night before a very important makeup session. The smell is ehh but that is least important, it cleans brushes in a breeze and does not leave any sort of smell on them. They’re so soft after they dry thanks to the conditioning part of this cleaner. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: santos.e.n

customer_reviews.title: This is so amazing!! It made all my brushes so soft ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so amazing!! It made all my brushes so soft and made them like new! I wouldn’t have known by looking them they have been used for ages! And I washed my sponges with this as well and it made them very soft and made my foundation spread more smoothly and even! Highly recommend!! With the conditioner mixed in makes so much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Renee White

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Foams and cleans brushes perfectly. My brushes feel softer than before with no oiliness or static feel. Be warned, a little goes a long way, but that's a good thing! :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this in a beauty subscription box and was amazed at how quickly and thoroughly it worked at cleaning my makeup brushes and sponges. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: deb roth

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Brush Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I use a battery operated makeup brush cleaner and this cleaner does great with it! I don'r need to use much at all. It cleans my brushes very well - no fall out, no residue... Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scattered Energy

customer_reviews.title: No instructions on bottle but works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I have never washed my brushes until now and man were 20 + years old. This was easy and effective. Only suggestion was there was no instructions in the bottle. So I had to guess how to use it but even winging it, I think it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Came with detailed Guide to clean brushes and smells amazing!!!!!!!! I only have Aesthetica Brusheðl
customer_reviews.author: BarbieDoLL

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my makeup brushes on and off for a few months now without cleaning them since before I could never get rid of all the makeup on them, but I was surprised this took every last trace off them now they look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Phooey

customer_reviews.title: Love it but at times feels like regular soap because ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it but at times feels like regular soap because you still take some time on taking the most makeup off the brushes, but compared to others solely makeup brush rinsers it is well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lau M.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works well
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Worked well on all my brushes, even the ones that were pretty gross. The fragrance was a bit stronger than what I expected, but it didn't linger on the brushes. Large size, great price - this should last me for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Jennnnnnnnnn

customer_reviews.title: Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: When I received it in the mail the package was all dented and beat up. I opened it and it had a hole in the top where some of the product leaked out. The cleaner itself did the job and you don’t need much to clean your brushes. Don’t think I will purchase again though because there is better out there.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hallahan

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not 100%
customer_reviews.text: Works better than traditional shampoo. Most of the makeup comes easily off the brush but there is still residue that stays on the brushes. I would reccomend instense scrubbing you are really serious about making the brush clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Le

customer_reviews.title: Great brush cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Great gel cleanser for the makeup bushes! It has a very mild light scent, it removes all the impurities from the brushes and it leaves them soft and ready for a clean and smoother application.
customer_reviews.author: DIANGEL

customer_reviews.title: Good makeup brush cleaning solution - would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good makeup brush cleaner. My brushes look and behave like new after cleaning them with this product. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Xinnie

customer_reviews.title: Great job esp on breaking down greasy foundations
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job cleaning brushes that been resistant to cleaning even by Dawn! Brushes came out clean and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy B. Roy

customer_reviews.title: It does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. It cleans my foundation and eye shadow brushes very well.
customer_reviews.author: Camil E. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Not too perfumey smell which means less chemicals. Foams ...
customer_reviews.text: Not too perfumey smell which means less chemicals. Foams up using my brush spinning cleaner. Gets all my brush’s clean. I feel it’s wroth it. You don’t need to use too much. Exspeacialy if you use and automatic spinning brush cleaner. It says to use 10ml for foundation brushes but honesty it doesn’t take that. It works!
customer_reviews.author: veronika kassin

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick cleans
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for quick cleans. For deep cleans of my makeup brushes I use a natural tea tree soap which I know will deep clean and disinfect

customer_reviews.title: Works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Cleans my makeup brushes great! It doesn’t take much to get them clean either. I would buy this product again and recommend it!

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: This is really good washed my brushes quickly and left them clean

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Shiny

It still takes a few rounds to get the bigger brushes fully clean but my brushes looked much cleaner and far softer once dry than Bare.

customer_reviews.title: It cleansed very thoroughly and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first make up brush cleanser product, and I am very impressed! It cleansed very thoroughly and I recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Yes!

The results are so good I actually look forward to cleaning them! And, I love that the product is cruelty free. Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.text: This gets all the makeup off the brushes, but it smells like glue and it doesn’t really condition the brushes.

customer_reviews.text: Leaves the brushes kind of stiff, but overall cleans the products. Would not re purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rhaissa

customer_reviews.title: Happy Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I really really liked this brush cleaner. Left my brushes nice and clean and didn’t dry them out. Before I ordered it, I read reviews about how the container is inconvenient. I decided to ignore it and judge for myself. I have to say, I totally agree that the container is not exactly the best option for a watery liquid substance. I cleaned about 20 brushes so I eventually had to think of a clever way to prop it up against the wall between washes. It did tip over a few times and I did yell not so nice things at it, but after all my brushes were nice and clean, I figured it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleaner; really does the job quickly and effectively. I used it on my Mac and Sephora pro brush sets and all brushes voiced back to original shape without any residue or staining from makeup. I also used it on my beauty blender and it really made it look like new. The smell is gentle and a pea amount is all you need per brush. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Kuna

customer_reviews.title: First time cleaner
customer_reviews.text: My first time using a brush cleaner. But a little goes a long way. So this may take me sometime to get through
customer_reviews.author: julie torres

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be in smaller size.
customer_reviews.text: Needs to be in smaller size. This product will probably last me years since I don't wash my makeup brushes very often
customer_reviews.author: Kamaile

customer_reviews.title: Great On Sponges Too!
customer_reviews.text: Does a wonderful job prepping new brushes for use, and even better on removing makeup and making them new-looking after they have been used. Also does awesome job on makeup sponges. Using regular soap or shampoo on them leaves them clean-ish but discolored. Using this cleanser on them, you squeeze them and brown makeup-y water runs out in a way that it doesn't with other cleaners, and they come back fully to their original color. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: NY Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Makeup Brush Cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I use makeup probably 5 days out of week, primarily for work, and am paranoid about keeping my makeup utensils super clean. This product works wonderfully to keep my brushes exceptionally clean. A couple of things: the scent isn’t terrible (imagine a light woodsy, forestry scent) but it wasn’t that great to me, personally. Word to the wise, a little bit of the product cleaner goes a long way. Overall, I recommend highly because it definitely keeps my brushes clean and hygienic.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleanser! Brushes look like new!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have tried many different products to clean my very expensive makeup brushes but nothing comes close to this gel. My brushes look new after cleaning with this product. Additionally, after I clean them, I dry them on a cooler setting with my hair dryer, then prop them in an upright position for a couple of days to guarantee they are completely dry throughout before using. Love this product and will definitely keep it on hand. Note: It doesn't take much to clean a foundation brush for example, so this will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: stlboomer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I love the beauty blender cleanser, but its expensive and I feel there must be something better out there. This is a pretty good dupe. I've been using it for several months now and it's gotten my blenders and brushes very clean, so I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rukiddinme33

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a department store brand cleaner for years. Down to my last drops and desperate I ordered this cleaner based on reviews. It exceeded my expectations. I started off with my old cleaner and was ready to hang the first brush when I thought to try this one. It dig deep and cleaned out more even makeup. It worked great on both vegan and natural hair brushes. This is my new go-to cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: CQ

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: This was okay. It cleaned my brushes, but it took several scrubs (compared to the beauty blender cleaner that gets it all in one go). It did NOT clean my sponges well at all. It'll do in a pinch, but if you want something quick and effective, I'd spend the extra bucks for a good cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, but thorough...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing brush cleaner! I was hesitant to order it because I lost brushes to cleaners that loosened the bristles out. This cleaner works with water...It’s wonderful Gentle, yet thorough! My white tipped bristle brushes are Snow White again! Leaves no residue! 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon? Maybe...

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and makes cleaning my brushes so easy! I might actually do it more regularly now-lol Removes the makeup quickly and easily. Combine with a rubber sink mat and this task is effortless!

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This product to clean my makeup brushes thoroughly, left them smelling fresh, and conditioned. Excellent product and I will be using it again.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I am someone who is very picky with anything to do with makeup, so I was pleasantly surprised by this product however it does take quite a bit of product to properly clean a brush which is why I gave 4 stars.

customer_reviews.title: Cleans brushes beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Works well even on my old brushes! Very pleased with my clean brushes.

product_meta.title: Aesthetica Makeup Brush Cleaner - Cruelty Free Make Up Brush Shampoo for any Brush, Sponge or Applicator - Made in USA - 6 oz.
feature_bullets: Specially formulated to break down product buildup and lingering grease, the Aesthetica Pro Series Brush Cleaner effectively removes accumulated makeup and dirt from all types of brushes. It dissolves grease while also conditioning brush fibers.

The powerful yet gentle cleanser is suitable for both natural and synthetic brushes and applicators, including sponges. Use it on a regular basis to help prolong the life of your favorite makeup tools.
Minimize skin irritation, break outs, and allergies by cleaning brushes and tools every few weeks. Ideal for using with the Aesthetica Makeup Brush Cleansing Mitt.
Made with humane ingredients, the Aesthetica Makeup Brush Cleaner is vegan and cruelty free for peace of mind. Cosmetics with a conscience give modern makeup a beautiful new dimension.
Each Aesthetica Makeup Brush Cleaner and Conditioner tube contains six (6) fluid ounces of product. One tube should last anywhere from 4 to 6 months with regular use.
